name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Proficient in **.NET MAUI**, **Appium**, **Selenium**, and **test automation**, with extensive experience in mobile application testing and CI/CD processes. Adept at navigating compliance standards such as **HIPAA** and **GDPR**. With a robust background in leading teams, demonstrating exceptional leadership and communication skills, I bring a strong problem-solving mindset to deliver high-quality software solutions. As a seasoned Full-Stack Software Engineer, I have successfully designed scalable, reliable, and user-centric applications using technologies like **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**, contributing to significant improvements in various industries, including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and implemented **test automation** strategies for mobile applications using **.NET MAUI**, achieving a **40% reduction** in testing time and ensuring compliance with **HIPAA** and **GDPR** regulations.
Led the **CI/CD** processes to enhance deployment efficiency, resulting in an **80% decrease** in release time through the use of **Appium** and **Selenium** for automated testing.
Conducted comprehensive **mobile application testing** for various platforms, ensuring a **99% accuracy** in reporting bugs and improving app performance.
Enhanced team leadership and communication skills to foster collaboration among developers and testers, contributing to a **30% improvement** in overall project delivery timelines.
Resolved complex problems related to automation frameworks and testing environments, leading to a robust testing infrastructure that supported the rapid growth of application features.

Leading the efforts in **test automation** for mobile applications using **Appium** and **Selenium**, enhancing testing efficiency by 30%.
Developing and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines to streamline testing and deployment processes, achieving a release frequency of 10 times per week.
Ensuring compliance with **HIPAA** and **GDPR** regulations during the testing process, maintaining a 100% compliance rate.
Coordinating cross-functional teams to enhance **mobile application testing** strategies, resulting in a 25% reduction in defects.
Demonstrating **leadership** and strong **communication** skills to mentor junior testers and foster a collaborative team environment, improving overall team productivity by 20%.
Utilizing **.NET MAUI** for developing mobile applications with a focus on optimal performance and user experience, achieving a user satisfaction rate of 90%.

Led testing initiatives in mobile application testing using **Appium** and **Selenium**, ensuring compliance with **HIPAA** and **GDPR** regulations.
Developed and implemented **CI/CD** pipelines for test automation, improving deployment efficiency by **60%**.
Championed problem-solving strategies that reduced bug incidence in production by **30%**.
Managed a team of testers, enhancing communication and collaboration within the team through weekly leadership meetings.
Executed comprehensive test strategies including functional, regression, and performance testing, achieving a test coverage of **95%**.
